response.overview: After falling in love with an extremely Idealist youth Tajul, Shanu ignored her luxurious life and left her home town, leaving behind just a short note with her new address. Shimul, after a long time, could manage to find Shanu out in a corner of an old township with cue of that note wherein he invents a new proletarian Shanu Wherein Shanu and Tajul are giving their everything, every breath and working really hard to run the family in a conscientious way. We cannot see those struggling breath with bare eyes. We, probably, can elucidate these struggling breaths as precious love of life. The name of the prehistoric story of this breath is “Myth of Love”.
response.title: Myth of Love
